meanings.sent1: I will be repainting my room this weekend.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys repainting old furniture to give it a fresh look.
meanings.sent3: After repainting the fence, it looked brand new!
meanings.sent4: The artist was repainting the mural with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The idea of repainting the entire house seemed daunting but exciting.

meanings.definition: The act of painting something again.
meanings.sent1: The repainting of the house was completed in just two days.
meanings.sent2: He hired a professional for the repainting of his car.
meanings.sent3: The repainting of the playground equipment made it look like new.
meanings.sent4: The repainting of the walls brought a sense of freshness to the room.
meanings.sent5: The repainting of the boat gave it a polished and well-maintained appearance.
